channel.title: Gene drives on Luke Holman
channel.description: Recent content in Gene drives on Luke Holman

item.title: Evolutionary simulations of Z-linked suppression gene drives
item.description: This paper presents eco-evo simulations investigating the feasibility of a newly-proposed type of gene drive, the W-shredder. W-shredders might someday be used to control populations of pests and pathogens that have ZW sex determination, such as Lepidopteran pests, parasitic trematodes, and cane toads.

item.title: Gene drives
item.description: Population genetics of natural and synthetic gene drives

item.title: The ecology and evolutionary dynamics of meiotic drive
Coevolutionary dynamics of polyandry and sex-linked meiotic drive
Even more functions of sperm RNA: a response to Hosken and Hodgson
